title: STAT+: Roche moves obesity drug to pivotal trials after mid-stage success
description: Roche plans to launch pivotal studies of an experimental weight loss drug after a successful mid-stage trial.
content: Roche plans to launch pivotal studies of an experimental weight loss drug after a successful mid-stage trial.
